mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ID, BOARD_ID, MEMBER_EMAIL, PASSWORD, MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_PHONE) VALUES (MEMBER_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 90, #{member_email}, #{password}, #{member_name}, #{member_phone})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(MEMBER_ID) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{email}
SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PASSWORD = #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PASSWORD = #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_COMMENT (COMMENT_ID, BOARD_ID, COMMENT_BOARD_ID, COMMENT_POST_ID, DESC_DETAIL, CREATER, CREATE_DATE) VALUES (COMMENT_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 91, #{comment_board_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comment_post_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{desc_detail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creater, jdbcType=INTEGER}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT MC.COMMENT_Id, MC.COMMENT_BOARD_ID, MC.COMMENT_POST_ID, MC.DESC_DETAIL, M.MEMBER_NAME , il.FILE_PATH , MC.CREATE_DATE FROM MEMBER_COMMENT mc INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_ID = MC.CREATER LEFT OUTER JOIN IMG_LIST il ON m.MEMBER_ID = IL.POST_ID AND m.BOARD_ID = il.BOARD_ID WHERE 1=1 AND MC.COMMENT_BOARD_ID = #{comment_board_id} AND MC.COMMENT_POST_ID = #{comment_post_id}
